@media screen and (max-width:1500px){
    .password-list-item .item-info .item-username,.password-list-item .item-info .item-website{width:12rem}
}
@media screen and (max-width:1100px){
    .auth-container{width:50vw}.dashboard-container{grid-template-columns:30% 1fr}.sort-panel-container{padding:1rem .2rem .2rem}
}
@media screen and (max-width:800px){
    html{font-size:12px}.navbar-container .logo{padding-left:1rem}.dashboard-container{grid-template-columns:40% 1fr}.password-panel-header-buttons{justify-content:space-around}.password-panel-header-buttons button{font-size:.7rem;width:6rem}
}
@media screen and (max-width:450px){
    .auth-container{width:80vw}.navbar-container{flex-direction:column;padding:1rem;height:8rem}.navbar-container .logo{padding-top:1rem}.dashboard-container{height:auto;grid-template-areas:"list" "panel";grid-template-columns:1fr;grid-template-rows:1fr 1fr}.sort-panel-container{padding-left:1rem;padding-right:1rem}.create-btn-container{width:100vw}.sort-panel-container .sort-panel-block .sort-select{margin-left:4rem;margin-top:2rem}
}
